title: BC Bike Race announce Mega Volt multi-day eMTB Challenge on Vancouver Island
content:
The BC Bike Race have announced details of an all-new enduro event, due to take place on October 22nd-24th. The Mega Volt is a three day eMTB Challenge Event, taking in four stages through the Cowichan Valley in the southern region of Vancouver Island. It’s not a race exactly; each stage presents its own special […]

The post BC Bike Race announce Mega Volt multi-day eMTB Challenge on Vancouver Island appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
